title: Founder & CEO, Meat Trading Hub
story: Most European meat and food brands struggle when entering Asia. They underestimate market fit, pick the wrong partners, and assume deals happen just because the product is good. That’s why I started Meat Trading Hub in 2010: to make sure brands don’t just "enter" Asia, but actually win here. 𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗪𝗲 𝗗𝗼 - Align 𝗠𝗮𝗿𝗸𝗲𝘁 𝗳𝗶𝘁 before any contract is signed. - 𝗕𝗲𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗽𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗻𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗽𝘀 for 𝗯𝗲𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝘀𝗮𝗹𝗲𝘀 connecting B2B brands with the right buyers (not just anyone who shows interest). - Lead 𝗛𝗶𝗴𝗵-𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗸𝗲𝘀 𝗻𝗲𝗴𝗼𝘁𝗶𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 to secure better pricing, stronger multi-year commitments, and avoid costly mistakes. 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝘂𝗹𝘁𝘀 - Drove €300M+ in B2B revenue for 30+ European brands across Korea, Singapore, and Vietnam. - Launched new meat specifications, boosting production by 20% and starting new ventures in Asia. - Led market corrections that turned around declining sales and unlocked new revenue streams—achieving 9.8% sales CAGR and 8.5% volume CAGR over a decade. - Secured sustained profitability and reputation for clients in the toughest APAC markets, not just one-off wins.
bullet_before: Established Meat Trading Hub in **2010** to assist European food brands in effectively entering and succeeding in the Asian market.
Aligned market fit for **30+ European brands** by identifying optimal partnerships, resulting in **€300M+** in B2B revenue across Korea, Singapore, and Vietnam over **10 years**.

Led high-stakes negotiations that secured stronger multi-year commitments, enhancing pricing and preventing costly errors, resulting in a **9.8% sales CAGR** and **8.5% volume CAGR** over the last decade.
Launched new meat specifications that boosted production efficiency by **20%**, facilitating the initiation of new ventures in the Asian market within **2 years**.

Implemented strategic market corrections that transformed declining sales into sustainable revenue streams, establishing long-term profitability and reputation for clients in competitive APAC markets.
bullet_after: Drove €300M+ in B2B revenue for 30+ European brands across Asia, achieving over 20 successful market entries within 3-6 months.
Launched new meat specifications, increasing production by 20% and initiating 5+ new ventures in Asia's competitive markets.
Led market corrections that reversed declining sales, achieving 9.8% CAGR in sales and 8.5% CAGR in volume over a decade for key clients.
suggestions:
- Include specific examples of the types of partners secured to illustrate partnership development.
- Highlight any awards or recognitions received for revenue achievements or market entries.
- Add a statement about client satisfaction metrics or feedback to demonstrate the impact on reputation and relationships.
